verses.verse: <S%H5315><s%>"'When anyone offers <S%H7126><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> of a meal <S%H4503><s%> offering to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> shall be of fine flour; <S%H5560><s%> and he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it, <S%H5414><s%> and put frankincense on it. <S%H3828><s%>

He shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s sons, <S%H1121><s%> the priests; <S%H3548><s%> and he shall take <S%H7061><s%> his <S%H8033><s%> handful <S%H7062><s%> of its fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and of its oil, <S%H8081><s%> with all its frankincense; <S%H3828><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> its memorial <S%H234><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

That which is left <S%H3498><s%> of the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>'. It is a most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> thing of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire. <S%H801><s%>

<S%H7126><s%>"'When you offer an offering <S%H4503><s%> of a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> baked <S%H3989><s%> in the oven, <S%H8574><s%> it shall be unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> or unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

If your offering <S%H4503><s%> is a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of the griddle, <S%H4227><s%> it shall be of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>
You shall cut <S%H6626><s%> it in pieces, <S%H6595><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it. <S%H4503><s%> It is a meal offering.
If your offering <S%H4503><s%> is a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of the pan, <S%H4802><s%> it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

You shall bring <S%H935><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> that is made <S%H6213><s%> of these things to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be presented <S%H7126><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and he shall bring <S%H5066><s%> it to the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H7311><s%> from the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> its memorial, <S%H234><s%> and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

That which is left <S%H3498><s%> of the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s and his sons <S%H1121><s%>'. It is a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made by fire. <S%H801><s%>

<S%H4503><s%>"'No meal offering, which you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with yeast; <S%H2557><s%> for you shall burn <S%H6999><s%> no yeast, <S%H2557><s%> nor any honey, <S%H1706><s%> as an offering <S%H801><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

As an offering <S%H7133><s%> of firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> them to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> but they shall not ascend <S%H5927><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Every offering <S%H7133><s%> of your meal offering <S%H7133><s%> you shall season <S%H4414><s%> with salt; <S%H4417><s%> neither shall you allow the salt <S%H4417><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of your God <S%H430><s%> to be lacking <S%H7673><s%> from your meal offering. <S%H4503><s%> With all your offerings <S%H4503><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> salt. <S%H4417><s%>

<S%H7126><s%>"'If you offer a meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of first fruits <S%H1061><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> for the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of your first fruits <S%H1061><s%> grain in the ear <S%H24><s%> parched <S%H7033><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> bruised <S%H1643><s%> grain of the fresh ear. <S%H3759><s%>
You shall put <S%H5414><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on it, <S%H5414><s%> and lay frankincense <S%H3828><s%> on it: <S%H4503><s%> it is a meal offering.

The priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> as its memorial, <S%H234><s%> part of its bruised grain, <S%H1643><s%> and part of its oil, <S%H8081><s%> along with all its frankincense: <S%H3828><s%> it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
